title: Augmented Reality-Based Secondary Mathematics Spatial Reasoning Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Graduate school-affiliated secondary school linkage program. Blended learning environment utilizing AR tablet apps and LMS with personalized spatial reasoning tasks

learning_goals: They can accurately analyze and explain rotations, symmetries, and projection transformations of shapes in 3D space through AR simulations.
They reconstruct the spatial composition of real-world structures (e.g., bridges, buildings) using AR models and derive mathematical principles.
In a collaborative AR environment, they solve 3D spatial problems and share spatial reasoning strategies through peer assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
